summary: Comprehensive testing of Privity Share Booking System completed. Backend APIs are fully functional with 19/20 tests passing. Frontend UI loads correctly with proper navigation and role-based access control working as designed.

minor_bugs.impact: Does not affect functionality, only test cleanup

permission_issues.issue: New users created with Viewer role (role 5) have insufficient permissions
permission_issues.note: This is correct behavior - role-based access control is working as designed

passed_tests: All page navigation (Clients, Stocks, Bookings, Reports)
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider updating default user role assignment for better user experience, or implement role upgrade workflow. Current role-based access control is working correctly but may confuse new users.
